original: 11. Termination . This Agreement shall automatically terminate at and as of (the first to occur of): (a) 12:00 midnight, New York City time, on the  30th day after the Effective Date (if Purchaser has not commenced the Offer, with the unanimous consent of the Sponsors, by then);  (b) the expiration of the Offer (if the Offer is not consummated pursuant to the terms of the Offer), subject to any extension  or subsequent offering period;
ollama_generated:
11. Survival and Continuation . This Agreement shall persist, unless terminated earlier in accordance with the following conditions: (a) Prior to 12:00 midnight, New York City time, on the 30th day following the Effective Date, if the Sponsors collectively determine, at their discretion, that the Purchaser has not initiated the Offer; (b) Upon expiration of the Offer, provided that the Offer has not been completed in accordance with its terms, or during any extension or subsequent offering period.

This modification preserves the original clause's essence but inverts the conditions for termination, shifting more responsibility to the Sponsors for determining when the Agreement may be terminated.

original: Tender Offer Statement on Schedule TO - July 16, 2012 Exhibit (d)(i) Sponsorship Agreement - July 16, 2012 13. Severability . In the event that any provision hereof would, under applicable law, be invalid or unenforceable in any respect, such provision  shall be construed by modifying or limiting it so as to be valid and enforceable to the maximum extent compatible with applicable  law.
ollama_generated: 13. Amendability: In the event that any provision herein, under applicable law, is deemed invalid or unenforceable in any aspect, such provision shall be revised, if necessary, to accommodate a reasonable adjustment that maintains its essential purpose while still being valid and enforceable according to said law. The remaining provisions of this agreement shall continue in full force and effect, unaffected by such modification.

original: 14. Remedies . Except as otherwise provided herein, this Agreement shall be enforceable by all available remedies at law or in equity (including,  without limitation, specific performance). Each Participating Sponsor shall be entitled, in their discretion, to either (a) specific performance of this Agreement and the Equity Commitment Letters, together with any costs of enforcement incurred by such Participating Sponsor in seeking to enforce such remedy against any Defaulting Sponsor or (b) payment by the Defaulting Sponsor in an amount  equal to the out-of-pocket damages incurred by such Participating Sponsor. If any Participating Sponsor elects to enforce the remedy  described in the preceding sentence against any Defaulting Sponsor, such Participating Sponsor shall do so against all Defaulting  Sponsors. No party shall be entitled to recover lost profits or benefit of the bargain damages. If more than one Defaulting Sponsor  is responsible for any damages, each such Defaulting Sponsor's liability for such damages shall be determined pro rata (based on  the Commitments of such Defaulting Sponsors).
modified: 14. Remedies: Except where otherwise specified in this Agreement, all parties acknowledge and agree that this Agreement is subject to the full range of legal and equitable remedies. Each Non-Defaulting Sponsor retains, at their sole discretion, the right to: (a) seek specific performance of this Agreement and the Equity Commitment Letters, along with any related costs incurred in enforcing such remedy against a Defaulting Sponsor; or (b) recover from the Defaulting Sponsor an amount equivalent to the actual losses sustained as a result of the default. In the event a Non-Defaulting Sponsor elects to enforce this right against any Defaulting Sponsor, they may do so against all Defaulting Sponsors collectively. No party shall have the right to claim lost profits or beneficial damages. In the event that multiple Defaulting Sponsors are responsible for damages, their individual liabilities will be apportioned based on the relative size of their commitments (rather than pro rata). This means that a Defaulting Sponsor with a larger commitment may bear a greater proportion of the total liability for damages compared to one with a smaller commitment.

original: 20. Other Agreements . This Agreement, together with the agreements referenced herein, constitutes the entire agreement, and supersedes all prior agreements,  understandings, negotiations and statements, both written and oral, among the parties or any of their affiliates with respect to the subject matter contained herein except for such other agreements as are referenced herein which shall continue in full force  and effect in accordance with their terms.
ollama_generated: 20. Comprehensive Agreement: This Agreement, along with any references made within it, represents the complete understanding between the parties involved, overriding all previous agreements, discussions, negotiations, and representations, both written and verbal, regarding the specified subject matter, except for those referenced agreements which shall maintain their original validity according to their respective terms. The responsibility for ensuring the continuation of any such agreements lies with the respective parties.

original: 24. Counterparts . This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, and by the different parties hereto in separate counterparts, each  of which when executed shall be deemed to be an original but all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same agreement.
ollama_generated: 24. Multiple Execution . This Agreement can be signed individually by each party involved (collectively referred to as "the Parties") in separate counterparts, with each such counterpart considered an authentic original. However, for this Agreement to be valid and binding, at least one party must execute and deliver a signed copy to all other parties. In the absence of any express statement to the contrary, these individual signed copies shall collectively constitute a single, unified agreement.

original: Remainder of Page Intentionally Left  Blank. Signature Page(s) to Follow.
ollama_generated:
Unfilled Portion of This Document Deliberately Reserved. Execution Pages to Precede.

In this version, the clause is rephrased subtly to emphasize that the document being signed may have additional pages following the current one, which could contain crucial information or signatures.

modified:
SELLER:

Upon delivery of the Goods to Purchaser, Seller shall be deemed to have fulfilled its obligations, unless: (a) the Goods are found to be non-conforming and such non-conformity is reported to Seller within three (3) Business Days of receipt; or (b) Purchaser fails to pay any amounts due under this Agreement within fifteen (15) days of invoice date. In all other cases, Seller shall have no liability for any loss, damage, or expense suffered by Purchaser as a result of the use or misuse of the Goods.
